Cell.Data: Anything between straight brackets - i.e. [ ] - is a formatting tag. Do not change these tags and keep them in the same relative position in the text. Anything between curly brackets - i.e. { } - is a place where text or numbers will be inserted by the game. Do not change the tag, but feel free to change its position in the text to suit the localized text.

Project a sound in a {hexrad} hex radius that deals {SoundDamage}[damagePhysical/] damage with [abilityred]High Impact[/abilityred] to units in the area.[br/]Non-Ethereal units have a {DisorientedChance}[strengthPhysical/] strength chance of becoming [abilityred]Disoriented[/abilityred], giving the unit a {FumbleChance}% fumble chance to its attacks for {Duration}[turn/].

向 {hexrad} 个单元格范围发射一阵音波，对范围内的单位造成 {SoundDamage}[damagePhysical/] 伤害并附加[abilityred]高度冲击[/abilityred]。[br/]非虚灵单位有 {DisorientedChance}[strengthPhysical/] 力量几率陷入[abilityred]迷失[/abilityred]，使其所有攻击有 {FumbleChance}% 几率失手，持续 {Duration}[turn/]。
Disoriented is a status effect whose description can be found in StatusEffects_UnitProperties_DLC04
A special Sonic frequency hits targets in a {hexrad} hex radius, dealing {SoundDamage}[damagePhysical/] damage and destroying {ShieldAmount}[shield/] until the end of combat.
向 {hexrad} 个单元格范围内的目标单位发射一阵特殊的音波频率，造成 {SoundDamage}[damagePhysical/] 伤害并摧毁其 {ShieldAmount}[shield/]，持续至战斗结束。

Attempt to apply [abilityred]Reverb[/abilityred] {ReverbAmount} times to all units in a {HexRadius} hex radius. Each attempt has a strength {ReverbChance}[strengthphysical/] chance to succeed, applying [abilityred]Resonance[/abilityred] instead on failure. If a unit has {StackAmount} stacks of reverb, it explodes damaging itself and adjacent units for {ReverbDamage}[damagePhysical/].

尝试对 {HexRadius} 个单元格范围内的所有单位施加 {ReverbAmount} 次[abilityred]混响[/abilityred]。每次尝试有 {ReverbChance}[strengthphysical/] 力量几率成功，如果失败，则改为施加[abilityred]共振[/abilityred]。如果有单位叠加了 {StackAmount} 层混响，单位将爆炸并伤害自身及其相邻单位，造成 {ReverbDamage}[damagePhysical/] 伤害。
Reverb is a status effect whose description can be found in StatusEffects_UnitProperties_DLC04

At the end of each enemy turn, for {Duration}[turn/], all enemy units take {SoundDamage}[damagePhysical/] and gain [abilityred]Resonance[/abilityred], reducing their [damagePhysical/] resistance for {ResonanceDuration}[turn/].
在每个敌方回合结束时，所有敌方单位受到 {SoundDamage}[damagePhysical/] 伤害，持续 {Duration}[turn/]；另外还会使敌方单位获得[abilityred]共振[/abilityred]，使其抵抗减少 [damagePhysical/]，持续 {ResonanceDuration}[turn/]。
Resonance is a status effect whose description can be found in StatusEffects_UnitProperties_DLC04

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
